Looks like curiosity got the best of both of us.
On a journey to discover what happened to his father,
Felix Catis got more than he bargained for.
Through trials and tribulations, the mystery of Pop's
Curiosity may have killed the Catis’, but it brought
down a horror that otherwise would have continued to
plague Earth, had it not been for the love of a father
and the inquisitive nature of our hero.
